categories: Category:The Truce at Bakura Sourcebook narrative fiction

nodes.text: The Deposition of General Solo, originally titled Deposition 9483749/12982 {Verbal}, is a short story in dialogue form, featured in The Truce at Bakura Sourcebook. It was written by Kathy Tyers and Eric S. Trautmann. The story was later made available for reading on Star Wars Hyperspace under the revised title.
General Han Solo and Lieutenant Page are debriefed by Mon Mothma and Admiral Gial Ackbar over their unauthorized decision to capture the Imperial Star Destroyer Accuser after the Battle of Endor.
